articles.author: David Opie
articles.title: Falcon and Winter Soldier director on Easter eggs and cut scenes - digitalspy.com
articles.description: "I feel very thankful that I’m part of the team telling this particular story about diversity."
articles.content:
The Falcon and the Winter Soldier spoilers follow.
Traditionally, superhero storytelling is defined in large part by duality. Think good vs evil or the juxtaposition between costumed life and the se… [+9022 chars]
